title: BRIEF-Adani Group Appoints MSTC To Sell All Surplus Inventory, Other Equipment
text:
BRIEF-Adani Group Appoints MSTC To Sell All Surplus Inventory, Other Equipment

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Sep 11, 2019 18:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Adani Group Appoints MSTC To Sell All Surplus Inventory, Other Equipment Sept 11 (Reuters) - MSTC Ltd : * INDIA'S MSTC LTD SAYS ADANI GROUP NAMED MSTC AS SELLING AGENT TO SELL ALL SURPLUS INVENTORY, OTHER EQUIPMENT (MINUS SCRAP) OF ENTIRE GROUP Further company coverage: MSTC.NS

BRIEF-Adani Group Appoints MSTC To Sell All Surplus Inventory, Other Equipment
description: BRIEF-Adani Group Appoints MSTC To Sell All Surplus Inventory, Other Equipment
